siteSummary.name: Talwar Jewellery House
siteSummary.description: Talwar Jewellery House is Chandigarh's leading Luxury Jewellery Brand. Shop our exquisite range of premium handmade designer gold, diamond and heritage jewellery. For over 100 years, and now five generations, the Talwar family has provided superior guest services, quality, and value.

topics.name: No more products available for purchase
Gemstones
topics.description: Despite the immense popularity of diamonds, coloured gemstones have always been among the most popular and expressive forms of jewellery. Only three coloured gemstones are considered precious.

qaPairs.answer: Source of collection: Collected automatically when you access our Site using cookies, log files, web beacons, tags, or pixels .

qaPairs.question: What is Refund policy?
qaPairs.answer: We have a 14-day return policy, which means you have 14 days after receiving your item to request a return. To be eligible for a return, your item must be in the same condition that you received it, unworn or unused, with tags, and in its original packaging. You’ll also need the receipt or proof of

qaPairs.question: What is Gold And Diamond Jewellery?
What is Polki And Kundan Jewellery?
What is Avoid contact with harsh chemicals,?
qaPairs.answer: Avoid contact with harsh chemicals, chlorine, hair sprays, perfumes and makeup.

qaPairs.question: What is Adorn jewellery only after having?
qaPairs.answer: Adorn jewellery only after having applied make-up and perfume as the residues can affect the shine and charm.

qaPairs.question: What is While travelling and storing your?
qaPairs.answer: While travelling and storing your jewellery (sets, bangles), use proper fitted boxes. Improper handling might result in breakage and damage.

qaPairs.question: What is Check studded jewellery regularly, for?
qaPairs.answer: Check studded jewellery regularly, for the prongs holding the gemstones may have worn out which would allow the gemstones to loosen and fall off.
